scripts.predev:ports: lsof -ti :5001 -sTCP:LISTEN | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti :5003 -sTCP:LISTEN | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti :5000 -sTCP:LISTEN | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:all: npm run predev:ports && concurrently -k "npm run start-mf --prefix header-app" "npm run start-mf --prefix cards-app" "wait-on http://localhost:5001/assets/remoteEntry.js http://localhost:5003/assets/remoteEntry.js && npm run preview --prefix marketplace-host -- --port 5000 --strictPort"
